34:I[83908,["/_next/static/chunks/aafbbff64245ce70.js","/_next/static/chunks/fef849d6204e9585.js","/_next/static/chunks/9b07fe85c42494db.js"],"ShareButtonWrapper"]
15:["$","$L14","9",{"scale":1.01,"children":["$","blockquote",null,{"className":"border-l-4 border-stone-400 dark:border-stone-600 pl-6 my-8 text-stone-700 dark:text-stone-300 italic text-xl leading-relaxed bg-stone-50 dark:bg-stone-800 py-4 pr-4 rounded-r-lg","children":"醒时同交欢，醉后各分散。"}]}]
16:["$","$L14","10",{"scale":1.01,"children":["$","blockquote",null,{"className":"border-l-4 border-stone-400 dark:border-stone-600 pl-6 my-8 text-stone-700 dark:text-stone-300 italic text-xl leading-relaxed bg-stone-50 dark:bg-stone-800 py-4 pr-4 rounded-r-lg","children":"永结无情游，相期邈云汉。"}]}]
17:["$","hr","11",{"className":"my-10 border-stone-200 dark:border-stone-800"}]
18:["$","$L12","12",{"delay":0.6000000000000001,"children":["$","h2",null,{"className":"text-2xl md:text-3xl font-bold text-stone-800 dark:text-stone-100 mt-12 mb-6 pb-4 border-b-2 border-stone-100 dark:border-stone-800","children":"创作背景"}]}]
19:["$","p","13",{"className":"text-stone-600 dark:text-stone-400 leading-relaxed my-4 text-lg","children":"这首诗约作于唐玄宗天宝三载（744年），时李白在长安，正处于官场失意之时。当时李白在长安供奉翰林，但政治上不受重视，又受权贵谗毁，心情孤寂苦闷，遂作此诗。"}]
1a:["$","hr","14",{"className":"my-10 border-stone-200 dark:border-stone-800"}]
1b:["$","$L12","15",{"delay":0.75,"children":["$","h2",null,{"className":"text-2xl md:text-3xl font-bold text-stone-800 dark:text-stone-100 mt-12 mb-6 pb-4 border-b-2 border-stone-100 dark:border-stone-800","children":"译文"}]}]
1c:["$","p","16",{"className":"text-stone-600 dark:text-stone-400 leading-relaxed my-4 text-lg","children":"在花丛中摆上一壶美酒，我自斟自饮，身边没有一个亲友。"}]
1d:["$","p","17",{"className":"text-stone-600 dark:text-stone-400 leading-relaxed my-4 text-lg","children":"举杯向天，邀请明月，与我的影子相对，便成了三人。"}]
1e:["$","p","18",{"className":"text-stone-600 dark:text-stone-400 leading-relaxed my-4 text-lg","children":"明月既不能理解开怀畅饮之乐，影子也只能默默地跟随在我的左右。"}]
1f:["$","p","19",{"className":"text-stone-600 dark:text-stone-400 leading-relaxed my-4 text-lg","children":"暂且以明月影子相伴，趁此春宵要及时行乐。"}]
20:["$","p","20",{"className":"text-stone-600 dark:text-stone-400 leading-relaxed my-4 text-lg","children":"我吟诵诗篇，月亮伴随我徘徊；我手足舞蹈，影子便随我蹁跹。"}]
21:["$","p","21",{"className":"text-stone-600 dark:text-stone-400 leading-relaxed my-4 text-lg","children":"清醒时我与你一同分享欢乐，酒醉以后各奔东西。"}]
22:["$","p","22",{"className":"text-stone-600 dark:text-stone-400 leading-relaxed my-4 text-lg","children":"我愿与他们永远结下忘掉伤情的友谊，相约在缥缈的银河边。"}]
23:["$","hr","23",{"className":"my-10 border-stone-200 dark:border-stone-800"}]
24:["$","$L12","24",{"delay":1.2000000000000002,"children":["$","h2",null,{"className":"text-2xl md:text-3xl font-bold text-stone-800 dark:text-stone-100 mt-12 mb-6 pb-4 border-b-2 border-stone-100 dark:border-stone-800","children":"赏析"}]}]
25:["$","p","25",{"className":"text-stone-600 dark:text-stone-400 leading-relaxed my-4 text-lg","children":"这首诗写诗人在月夜花下独酌，无人亲近的冷落情景。诗人运用丰富的想象，表现出一种由独而不独，由不独而独，再由独而不独的复杂情感。"}]
26:["$","p","26",{"className":"text-stone-600 dark:text-stone-400 leading-relaxed my-4 text-lg","children":"诗人下笔点题，突出一个\"独\"字。春天幽静的月夜，月色溶溶，花香袭人，本该是尽情赏玩之时，但诗人却一个人在花下独饮，身边没有一个亲友，其孤独寂寞可想而知。"}]
27:["$","p","27",{"className":"text-stone-600 dark:text-stone-400 leading-relaxed my-4 text-lg","children":"然而诗人忽发奇想，把天边的明月，和月光下自己的影子，拉了过来，连自己在内，化成了三个人，举杯共酌，冷清清的场面，就热闹起来了。这就是\"举杯邀明月，对影成三人\"。"}]
28:["$","p","28",{"className":"text-stone-600 dark:text-stone-400 leading-relaxed my-4 text-lg","children":"可是，月不解饮，影徒随身，仍归孤独。因而自第五句至第八句，从月、影之\"无情\"逗出自己暂且与月、影交游之\"有情\"，一个\"暂\"字，将诗人的欢娱之态、自得之状刻画得淋漓尽致。"}]
29:["$","p","29",{"className":"text-stone-600 dark:text-stone-400 leading-relaxed my-4 text-lg","children":"\"我歌月徘徊，我舞影零乱。醒时同交欢，醉后各分散。\"这四句是全诗的重心所在。诗人在酒兴正酣之际，载歌载舞，明月因之徘徊不去，身影也随之前俯后仰，仿佛真的成了共饮的好朋友。"}]
2a:["$","p","30",{"className":"text-stone-600 dark:text-stone-400 leading-relaxed my-4 text-lg","children":"最后二句，诗人真诚地和\"月\"、\"影\"相约：\"永结无情游，相期邈云汉。\"然而\"月\"和\"影\"毕竟还是无情之物，把无情之物，结为交游，主要还是在于诗人自己的有情。"}]
2b:["$","p","31",{"className":"text-stone-600 dark:text-stone-400 leading-relaxed my-4 text-lg","children":"诗的题目是\"月下独酌\"，诗人运用丰富的想象，表现出一种由独而不独，由不独而独，再由独而不独的复杂情感。全诗以乐写愁，以热闹写孤寂，取得了强烈的艺术效果。"}]
2c:["$","hr","32",{"className":"my-10 border-stone-200 dark:border-stone-800"}]
2d:["$","$L12","33",{"delay":1.6500000000000001,"children":["$","h2",null,{"className":"text-2xl md:text-3xl font-bold text-stone-800 dark:text-stone-100 mt-12 mb-6 pb-4 border-b-2 border-stone-100 dark:border-stone-800","children":"千古名句"}]}]
2e:["$","p","34",{"className":"font-semibold text-stone-800 dark:text-stone-200 my-6 text-xl","children":"\"举杯邀明月，对影成三人\""}]
2f:["$","p","35",{"className":"text-stone-600 dark:text-stone-400 leading-relaxed my-4 text-lg","children":"此句想象奇特，浪漫洒脱，表现出诗人旷达的胸怀和丰富的想象力。李白在无亲无友之时，能与明月、身影为伴，共享饮酒之乐，其豪放不羁的性格可见一斑。"}]
30:["$","hr","36",{"className":"my-10 border-stone-200 dark:border-stone-800"}]
31:["$","div","37",{"className":"mt-10 pt-6 border-t border-stone-200 dark:border-stone-800","children":[["$","h4",null,{"className":"text-sm font-medium text-stone-500 dark:text-stone-400 mb-3","children":"标签"}],["$","div",null,{"className":"flex flex-wrap gap-2","children":[["$","span","0",{"className":"px-4 py-2 bg-stone-100 dark:bg-stone-800 text-stone-700 dark:text-stone-300 text-sm rounded-full hover:bg-stone-200 dark:hover:bg-stone-700 transition-colors cursor-pointer","children":"孤独"}],["$","span","1",{"className":"px-4 py-2 bg-stone-100 dark:bg-stone-800 text-stone-700 dark:text-stone-300 text-sm rounded-full hover:bg-stone-200 dark:hover:bg-stone-700 transition-colors cursor-pointer","children":"浪漫"}],["$","span","2",{"className":"px-4 py-2 bg-stone-100 dark:bg-stone-800 text-stone-700 dark:text-stone-300 text-sm rounded-full hover:bg-stone-200 dark:hover:bg-stone-700 transition-colors cursor-pointer","children":"想象"}],["$","span","3",{"className":"px-4 py-2 bg-stone-100 dark:bg-stone-800 text-stone-700 dark:text-stone-300 text-sm rounded-full hover:bg-stone-200 dark:hover:bg-stone-700 transition-colors cursor-pointer","children":"饮酒"}],["$","span","4",{"className":"px-4 py-2 bg-stone-100 dark:bg-stone-800 text-stone-700 dark:text-stone-300 text-sm rounded-full hover:bg-stone-200 dark:hover:bg-stone-700 transition-colors cursor-pointer","children":"唐代"}]]}]]}]
